intro: Gymnosporia heyneana, commonly known as the African burr bush, is a shrub native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rhamnaceae and is characterized by its thorny stems and small, yellowish-green leaves. Gymnosporia heyneana is valued for its hardy nature and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
